text: Josh Flagg and Bobby Boyd may have just tied the knot, but the Million Dollar Listing Los Angeles agent knew long before he proposed that these two would one day be married. Josh shared an epic video that captured every magical moment from his big day, including a glimpse into his wedding vows. ` ` Bobby, in April of 2016, about four months after we had started seeing each other, I shared with you my vows because I knew already then that you were the one,'' Josh gushed at the altar. Now that's a spectacular wedding!
